amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds from being used to implement or enforce the Electronic Logging Device (ELD) mandate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 58 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit funds from being used to implement or enforce the Electronic Logging Device (ELD) mandate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 246 (Roll no. 456).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 246 (Roll no. 456).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Babin.
